mapper.select: SELECT IDX,left(CONTENTS, 40), TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC Limit 2
SELECT IDX, BOARD_IDX, PARENT_IDX, DEPTH, ORDER_IDX, NAME, PW, CONTENTS, CREA_DTM FROM TB_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_IDX=#{IDX}
SELECT MAX(orderNo) FROM comment START WITH PARENT_IDX=#{PARENT_IDX} CONNECT BY PRIOR IDX=PARENT_IDX ORDER BY orderNo DESC
SELECT IDX,left(CONTENTS, 40), TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} ORDER BY IDX DESC limit 0,20

SELECT IDX,left(CONTENTS, 40), TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and title like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') and CONTENTS like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} ORDER BY IDX DESC

SELECT IDX,left(CONTENTS, 40), TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and (title like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%') or CONTENTS like concat('%',#{SEARCH_WORD},'%')) ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT STUDY_IDX, date_format(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_DATE, TITLE,CONTENT FROM study_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY STUDY_IDX DESC Limit 4
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME ,CATEGORY_IDX FROM category WHERE P_CATEGORY_IDX = #{map}
SELECT IDX,CONTENTS, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} and IDX <= #{bnoToStart} and IDX >= 0 ORDER BY IDX DESC limit 0,20
SELECT IDX,CONTENTS, TITLE, HIT_CNT, CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' and CATEGORY_IDX=#{CATEGORY_IDX} and IDX >= #{bnoToStart} and IDX <= #{bnoToStart}+20 ORDER BY IDX DESC limit 0,20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID, CATEGORY_IDX ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE(), 'Admin',#{CATEGORY_IDX} )
INSERT INTO study_board ( TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{mTitle}, #{mContent}, SYSDATE() )
INSERT INTO category ( CATEGORY_NAME, P_CATEGORY_IDX) VALUES(#{addCategoryName},'0')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = ifnull(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS, CATEGORY_IDX FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, CONTENTS = #{CONTENTS} WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
UPDATE study_board SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE STUDY_IDX = #{STUDY_IDX}
